display_html: type CardanoEras c = '[ByronBlock, ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c), ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c), ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c), ShelleyBlock (AlonzoEra c)]
name: CardanoEras

display_html: type ShelleyBasedEras c = '[ShelleyEra c, AllegraEra c, MaryEra c, AlonzoEra c]
name: ShelleyBasedEras

display_html:
data HardForkBlock (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern BlockAllegra ∷ ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c) → CardanoBlock c
  • pattern BlockAlonzo ∷ ShelleyBlock (AlonzoEra c) → CardanoBlock c
  • pattern BlockByron ∷ ByronBlock → CardanoBlock c
  • pattern BlockMary ∷ ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c) → CardanoBlock c
  • pattern BlockShelley ∷ ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c) → CardanoBlock c
name: HardForkBlock BlockAllegra BlockAlonzo BlockByron BlockMary BlockShelley
Header HeaderAllegra HeaderAlonzo HeaderByron HeaderMary HeaderShelley
GenTx GenTxAllegra GenTxAlonzo GenTxByron GenTxMary GenTxShelley

display_html:
data HardForkApplyTxErr (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern ApplyTxErrAllegra ∷ ApplyTxErr (ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c)) → CardanoApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrAlonzo ∷ ApplyTxErr (ShelleyBlock (AlonzoEra c)) → CardanoApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrByron ∷ ApplyTxErr ByronBlock → CardanoApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrMary ∷ ApplyTxErr (ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c)) → CardanoApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrShelley ∷ ApplyTxErr (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoApplyTxErr c
name: HardForkApplyTxErr ApplyTxErrAllegra ApplyTxErrAlonzo ApplyTxErrByron ApplyTxErrMary ApplyTxErrShelley ApplyTxErrWrongEra
TxId GenTxIdAllegra GenTxIdAlonzo GenTxIdByron GenTxIdMary GenTxIdShelley

display_html:
data HardForkLedgerError (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern LedgerErrorAllegra ∷ LedgerError (ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c)) → CardanoLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorAlonzo ∷ LedgerError (ShelleyBlock (AlonzoEra c)) → CardanoLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorByron ∷ LedgerError ByronBlock → CardanoLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorMary ∷ LedgerError (ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c)) → CardanoLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorShelley ∷ LedgerError (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoLedgerError c
name: HardForkLedgerError LedgerErrorAllegra LedgerErrorAlonzo LedgerErrorByron LedgerErrorMary LedgerErrorShelley LedgerErrorWrongEra

display_html:
data HardForkEnvelopeErr (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorAllegra ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError (ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c)) → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorAlonzo ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError (ShelleyBlock (AlonzoEra c)) → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorByron ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError ByronBlock → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorMary ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError (ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c)) → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorShelley ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
name: HardForkEnvelopeErr OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorAllegra OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorAlonzo OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorByron OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorMary OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorShelley OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorWrongEra

display_html:
data OneEraTipInfo (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern TipInfoAllegra ∷ TipInfo (ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c)) → CardanoTipInfo c
  • pattern TipInfoAlonzo ∷ TipInfo (ShelleyBlock (AlonzoEra c)) → CardanoTipInfo c
  • pattern TipInfoByron ∷ TipInfo ByronBlock → CardanoTipInfo c
  • pattern TipInfoMary ∷ TipInfo (ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c)) → CardanoTipInfo c
  • pattern TipInfoShelley ∷ TipInfo (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoTipInfo c
name: OneEraTipInfo TipInfoAllegra TipInfoAlonzo TipInfoByron TipInfoMary TipInfoShelley

display_html: data family BlockQuery blk ∷ Type → Type
name: BlockQuery QueryAnytimeAllegra QueryAnytimeAlonzo QueryAnytimeByron QueryAnytimeMary QueryAnytimeShelley QueryHardFork QueryIfCurrentAllegra QueryIfCurrentAlonzo QueryIfCurrentByron QueryIfCurrentMary QueryIfCurrentShelley

display_html:
data Either a b where
  • pattern QueryResultSuccess ∷ result → CardanoQueryResult c result
  • pattern QueryResultEraMismatch ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoQueryResult c result
name: Either QueryResultSuccess QueryResultEraMismatch

display_html:
data HardForkLedgerConfig (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern CardanoLedgerConfig ∷ PartialLedgerConfig ByronBlock → PartialLedgerConfig (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → PartialLedgerConfig (ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c)) → PartialLedgerConfig (ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c)) → PartialLedgerConfig (ShelleyBlock (AlonzoEra c)) → CardanoLedgerConfig c
name: HardForkLedgerConfig CardanoLedgerConfig
LedgerState LedgerStateAllegra LedgerStateAlonzo LedgerStateByron LedgerStateMary LedgerStateShelley

display_html:
data HardForkState (f ∷ Type → Type) (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern ChainDepStateAllegra ∷ ChainDepState (BlockProtocol (ShelleyBlock (AllegraEra c))) → CardanoChainDepState c
  • pattern ChainDepStateAlonzo ∷ ChainDepState (BlockProtocol (ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c))) → CardanoChainDepState c
  • pattern ChainDepStateByron ∷ ChainDepState (BlockProtocol ByronBlock) → CardanoChainDepState c
  • pattern ChainDepStateMary ∷ ChainDepState (BlockProtocol (ShelleyBlock (MaryEra c))) → CardanoChainDepState c
  • pattern ChainDepStateShelley ∷ ChainDepState (BlockProtocol (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c))) → CardanoChainDepState c
name: HardForkState ChainDepStateAllegra ChainDepStateAlonzo ChainDepStateByron ChainDepStateMary ChainDepStateShelley

display_html:
data EraMismatch = EraMismatch {
  • ledgerEraName ∷ !Text
  • otherEraName ∷ !Text
}
name: EraMismatch EraMismatch ledgerEraName otherEraName

display_html: type CardanoHardForkConstraints c = (PraosCrypto c, ShelleyBasedEra (ShelleyEra c), ShelleyBasedEra (AllegraEra c), ShelleyBasedEra (MaryEra c), ShelleyBasedEra (AlonzoEra c), HASH c ~ Blake2b_256, ADDRHASH c ~ Blake2b_224, DSIGN c ~ Ed25519DSIGN)
name: CardanoHardForkConstraints

display_html: forecastAcrossShelley ∷ (EraCrypto eraFrom ~ EraCrypto eraTo, ShelleyBasedEra eraFrom) ⇒ ShelleyLedgerConfig eraFrom → ShelleyLedgerConfig eraTo → Bound → SlotNo → LedgerState (ShelleyBlock eraFrom) → Except OutsideForecastRange (Ticked (WrapLedgerView (ShelleyBlock eraTo)))
name: forecastAcrossShelley

display_html: overShelleyBasedLedgerState ∷ ∀ c. (PraosCrypto c, DSignable c (Hash c EraIndependentTxBody)) ⇒ (∀ era. (EraCrypto era ~ c, ShelleyBasedEra era) ⇒ LedgerState (ShelleyBlock era) → LedgerState (ShelleyBlock era)) → LedgerState (CardanoBlock c) → LedgerState (CardanoBlock c)
name: overShelleyBasedLedgerState

display_html: type CardanoHardForkConstraints c = (PraosCrypto c, ShelleyBasedEra (ShelleyEra c), ShelleyBasedEra (AllegraEra c), ShelleyBasedEra (MaryEra c), ShelleyBasedEra (AlonzoEra c), HASH c ~ Blake2b_256, ADDRHASH c ~ Blake2b_224, DSIGN c ~ Ed25519DSIGN)
name: CardanoHardForkConstraints

display_html: protocolInfoCardano ∷ ∀ c m. (IOLike m, CardanoHardForkConstraints c) ⇒ ProtocolParamsByron → ProtocolParamsShelleyBased (ShelleyEra c) → ProtocolParamsShelley c → ProtocolParamsAllegra c → ProtocolParamsMary c → ProtocolParamsAlonzo c → ProtocolTransitionParamsShelleyBased (ShelleyEra c) → ProtocolTransitionParamsShelleyBased (AllegraEra c) → ProtocolTransitionParamsShelleyBased (MaryEra c) → ProtocolTransitionParamsShelleyBased (AlonzoEra c) → ProtocolInfo m (CardanoBlock c)
name: protocolInfoCardano

display_html:
data ProtocolParamsByron = ProtocolParamsByron {
  • byronGenesis ∷ Config
  • byronPbftSignatureThreshold ∷ Maybe PBftSignatureThreshold
  • byronProtocolVersion ∷ ProtocolVersion
  • byronSoftwareVersion ∷ SoftwareVersion
  • byronLeaderCredentials ∷ Maybe ByronLeaderCredentials
  • byronMaxTxCapacityOverrides ∷ Overrides ByronBlock
}
